mapper.select: select it.itemid, it.itemcode, it.itemtype, it.itemname, it.origin, it.itemweight, it.itemprice, it.available, cli.clientname, cli.clientcode from item it join client cli on it.clientcode = cli.clientcode;

select * from item
where itemtype like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where itemname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
